title: NFL Week 5 Early Look at the Lines: Picks, Predictions and Betting Advice (Football 10/2)
description:
Will Brinson and John Breech take an early look at Week 4 lines. 

0:00 Intro
0:46 Colts @ Broncos
3:32 Giants @ Packers 
6:30 Steelers @ Bills
8:34 Lions @ Patriots 
10:55 Cowboys @ Rams
13:00 Eagles @ Cardinals 
15:30 Bengals @ Ravens 
18:44 Raiders @ Chiefs
